original_title: Lamb of God - Self Titled Live Stream
overview: "Our first global live stream is THIS FRIDAY, performing our new self-titled album in full. Get your tickets now at lamb-of-god.com  The show will stream at lamb-of-god.com and begins promptly at 2pm LA / 5pm NY / 10pm UK / 11pm EU. You must have a ticket to watch the performance, which will also be available to watch on-demand for 48 hours if you cannot watch at the time of the live stream.  A pre-show begins 1 hour BEFORE, hosted by Jose Mangin and featuring an opening set from Bleed From Within."
title: Lamb of God - Self Titled Live Stream
